reference.shortdesc: The info element contains additional information about the step.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The info element is specialized from div. It is defined in the task module.

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, the info element provides additional information about the ways that the step can be performed:
example.codeblock: <step> <cmd>Specify the configuration parameters.</cmd> <info>You can use either the command line or the product GUI. </info> </step>
